QuestData.Title: Legacy
QuestData.Description: I'd say we've earned our reward. I can't wait to taste what Mudmug's been brewing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Have a drink with Chen, Li Li, and Mudmug.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Li Li at Mudmug's Place in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: I know Uncle Chen's coming back. I'm not worried.$b$bActually, this is probably my big chance to finally explore Pandaria! No fat uncle tying me down!
